body:
Chris and Mostapha,



Can t figure why it is not solving the adjacencies when I combine two groups of zones with already solved adjacencies.



Maybe I am doing something very obviously wrong here.



A simple example that demonstrates the error attached. (All the newest components from GitHub)

Thanks,

Dimitris

replies.body:
This one solved.

Seems like you have to assign Zone names to at least one of the groups of the different zones to work properly.

I guess a fix would be to assign default random names to zones in case users don t manually assign them.



Dimitris
